H0.text: What is the minimum number of points needed to win a tiebreak in tennis, such as in the Hopman Cup for mixed doubles, on the ATP and WTA tours for doubles and sometmes in USTA league play. 5

H1.text: What is the minimum number of points needed to win a tiebreak in tennis, such as in the Hopman Cup for mixed doubles, on the ATP and WTA tours for doubles and sometmes in USTA league play. 7

H2.text: What is the minimum number of points needed to win a tiebreak in tennis, such as in the Hopman Cup for mixed doubles, on the ATP and WTA tours for doubles and sometmes in USTA league play. 12

H3.text: What is the minimum number of points needed to win a tiebreak in tennis, such as in the Hopman Cup for mixed doubles, on the ATP and WTA tours for doubles and sometmes in USTA league play. 10

A4.text: The 'best-five-of-nine-point' tiebreaker lasts a maximum of nine points, and awards victory in the set to whichever player or team first reaches five points

A5.text: The 'best-seven-of-twelve-point' tiebreaker lasts a minimum of seven points
